ComicInfo.Summary:
The annual Albatross Halloween comic for kids of all ages is back in a weekly October event! Issue #1 features the work of Eric Powell, Steve Mannion, and Kyle Hotz!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Eric Powell | 1 | B | Cover B | Jeff Smith | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 15:51:04. [CVDB687073] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 10:40:14. [Issue ID 1860082]

ComicInfo.Letterer: T. Warren Montgomery,Eric Powell,Warren Montgomery,Steve Mannion,Eric Powell,Warren Montgomery,Steve Mannion
ComicInfo.Title: Our Big Sister Is the Devil; The Crud Kid; Christina Some Go-Karts are Born Bad; Disgusting Monsters from Planet Glorgorf
